byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: Other American financial firms have worried over Europe's debt, but MF Global, run by Jon Corzine, is showing signs of facing a full panic.
snippet: Other American financial firms have worried over Europe's debt, but MF Global, run by Jon Corzine, is showing signs of facing a full panic.

headline.main: Europe's Debt Threatens MF Global, and Corzine
headline.print_headline: Europe’s Debt Threatens MF Global, And Corzine
